CatDescriptText: Mrs. Shirley Massie, 2529 Fifth Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 15, 1958, pg. 2 �Do you think that the numbers game should be legalized or outlawed?� answer reads: �I think they should be legalized.�
